lead_paragraph: For the survivors of wildfires in Alberta and Arizona, lives as well as homes need to rebuilt from scratch.

headline.print_headline: Finding Hope in a Wildfire’s Ashes
headline.main: Finding Hope in a Wildfire’s Ashes

snippet: For the survivors of wildfires in Alberta and Arizona, lives as well as homes need to rebuilt from scratch.
abstract: News Analysis; experience of residents of Yarnell, Ariz, can offer some hope for people in places like Fort McMurray, Alberta, where wildfire has devastated city; blaze that turned lives of Yarnell's 600 residents upside down nearly three years ago, killing 19 firefighters, is becoming ever-distant memory as life slowly inches toward normalcy again.
